QuestData.Title: Valkyrion Must Burn
QuestData.Description: The crate is filled with incendiary harpoons. You recall seeing harpoon guns and dry stacks of hay outside.$B$BPerhaps Iva will appreciate the extra effort and reward you appropriately.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Valkyrion Harpoon Guns to burn 6 Dry Haystacks.
QuestData.RewardText: Now that is what I call dedication! Those traitors might have a new master now, but they'll never forget their sisters' parting gift.
